---
title: "Standard deviation of monthly maximum temperatures"
format: html
editor: visual
---

**Source**: [Historical monthly weather data --- WorldClim 1 documentation](https://www.worldclim.org/data/monthlywth.html)
**Spatial Reference:** WGS 1984

```{r}
load(here('data', 'grappe_gps.RData'))

files <- dir(pattern = "*.tif")
files


map()



mean_temp <- terra::rast(here('data_raw', 'leon_data', 'rasters', 'Mean_temp.tif'))

# terra::crs(total_precipitation)

mean_temp_by_grappe <- mean_temp %>% 
  exactextractr::exact_extract(grappe_buffer) %>% 
  rbindlist(idcol = "id") %>% 
  group_by(id) %>% 
  summarize(mean_temp = sum(value * coverage_fraction) / sum(coverage_fraction))

save(mean_temp_by_grappe, file = here('data', 'mean_temp.RData'))
  
```
